Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to prohibiting the use of certain synthetic turf on surfaces used for recreational purposes.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Prohibiting the use of certain synthetic turf on surfaces used for recreational purposes.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring signage warning of heat dangers of playground equipment including safety surfacing.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Requiring signage warning of heat dangers of playground equipment including safety surfacing.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to the surface areas of playgrounds and playing fields.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Surface areas of playgrounds and playing fields.

Items.Title: Resolution calling upon the New York State Legislature to amend Section 399-dd of the General Business Law to allow municipalities to enact local laws regarding playground equipment and the Department of Parks and Recreation to require a temperature test for all equipment installed in parks and playgrounds, including safety surfacing, and to prohibit such materials from being installed that pose a health or burn danger to exposed skin.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Playground equipment and the Department of Parks and Recreation to require a temperature test for all equipment installed in parks and playgrounds.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to prohibiting the use of certain synthetic turf on surfaces used for recreational purposes.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Laid Over by Committee
Items.MatterName: Prohibiting the use of certain synthetic turf on surfaces used for recreational purposes.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring signage warning of heat dangers of playground equipment including safety surfacing.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Laid Over by Committee
Items.MatterName: Requiring signage warning of heat dangers of playground equipment including safety surfacing.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to the surface areas of playgrounds and playing fields.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Laid Over by Committee
Items.MatterName: Surface areas of playgrounds and playing fields.

Items.Title: Resolution calling upon the New York State Legislature to amend Section 399-dd of the General Business Law to allow municipalities to enact local laws regarding playground equipment and the Department of Parks and Recreation to require a temperature test for all equipment installed in parks and playgrounds, including safety surfacing, and to prohibit such materials from being installed that pose a health or burn danger to exposed skin.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Laid Over by Committee
Items.MatterName: Playground equipment and the Department of Parks and Recreation to require a temperature test for all equipment installed in parks and playgrounds.

Items.MinutesNote: Other Council Members Attending: Oddo, Ignizio, Lappin, Gioia, Mark-Viverito, Brewer and the Public Advocate (Betsy Gotbaum)
